abstract: Allies of Republican presidential contender Herman Cain have formed super PAC Americans for Herman Cain, which can raise and spend unlimited amounts of money on his behalf in hopes of helping him catch up to better-financed rivals.
snippet: Herman Cain’s allies have formed an group that can raise and spend unlimited amounts of money on his behalf, hoping to help him catch up to better-financed rivals.
lead_paragraph: Herman Cain’s allies have formed an group that can raise and spend unlimited amounts of money on his behalf, hoping to help him catch up to better-financed rivals.

headline.main: There’s Nothing Like a ‘Super PAC’ for the Serious Contender
headline.print_headline: There’s Nothing Like a ‘Super PAC’ for the Serious Contender
headline.seo: Herman Cain’s Allies Form a ‘Super PAC’
